entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as an event that has just passed, with people passing on their way to bed. ("the last stragglers from the Yule Ball passed them on their way to bed")

relationships.description: Dumbledore attended the Yule Ball, as people from the event are passing by him on their way to bed. ("the last stragglers from the Yule Ball passed them on their way to bed")
